column4: does anyone know where apt-get and Synaptic Package Manager download the packages to before they install them?
you can also just install server apps n a desktop machine.  Linux makes no distinction between 'desktops' and 'servers'.  Everything is a program, they all run equally well.
You want thin-clients.  Check out what edubuntu has to offer (its got a preconfigured thin client/server installer)
